entry.translation: Yuoo moost prufeede-a a pessvurd. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Problem logging in: Invalid username or password.
entry.translation: Prublem luggeeng in: Infeleed userneme-a oor pessvurd. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Your account has been terminated by your request or at the adminstrator's discression.
entry.translation: Yuoor eccuoont hes beee termeeneted by yuoor reqooest oor et zee edmeenstretur's deescressiun. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Your account has been marked as inactive. Contact the adminstrator with further questions.
entry.translation: Yuoor eccuoont hes beee merked es inecteefe-a. Cuntect zee edmeenstretur veet foorzeer qooesshuns. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Your account has not yet been activated by the site administrator
entry.translation: Yuoor eccuoont hes nut yet beee ecteefeted by zee seete-a edmeenistretur
